chinese: Reward is to give personal, group, organizational spirit or substance incentives to recognize their excellence in a certain field. The formal award usually held in a award ceremony, awarded awards by the awards, and accompanied by various prizes, such as medals, medals, trophies, awards, medals, or other forms of items, may also be given directly. Money, called a bonus, if it is a bonus to the student, called a scholarship. In sports competitions or other types of competitions, different levels of prizes are usually given in accordance with the number of winners. For example, the gold medal will be given to the champion, and the silver medal will be given to the runner-up. The bronze medal will give the quarter.
